explains: adj. 可投掷的；用以发射导弹的
wordGroup: ballistic missile n. 弹道飞弹，弹道导弹
cruise missile n. 巡航导弹
guided missile 导弹；导向飞弹；有线导引飞弹
long-range missile 远程导弹；洲际弹道导弹
missile launcher 导弹发射器；火箭发射装置
nuclear missile 带核弹头导弹；战术核导弹
anti-aircraft missile 防空导弹；防空飞弹
intercontinental ballistic missile 洲际弹道导弹；洲际导弹

sentences.en: The missile homed in on the target.
The missile fell harmlessly into the sea.
sentences.cn: 导弹落到了海里，没有导致任何伤害。

sentences.en: Their most potent weapon was the Exocet missile.
sentences.cn: 他们效力最强的武器是飞鱼导弹。
